document_data.name: Armeld
document_data.mainbody: '''Armeld''' was a [[War Wizard]] of [[Cormyr]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Some of his underlings regarded Armeld as a death-seeking glory-hound.
document_data.History: Armeld was a part of the retinue of the [[Royal Magician of Cormyr]], [[Caladnei]] in early spring of {{yearlink|1373}}, when they raided the [[Marsember]] meeting of the [[Rightful Conspiracy]]. He was the superior of a number of War Wizards, many of them answering to him during the raid, and coordinating with him.
